triples.evidence: Because this kind of rotation is a basic example of an orthonormal transformation
That’s why understanding this simple 2D rotation helps us better appreciate what the Fourier transform is doing
You can also write this transformation in matrix form. It’s a simple 2-by-2 rotation matrix.
Because this kind of rotation is a basic example of an orthonormal transformation, just like the Fourier transform.
Understanding this simple 2D rotation helps us better appreciate what the Fourier transform is doing.
